questions.question: What is the predominant color of the bottle's contents?
What is the overall shape of the bottle?
What material appears to constitute the bottle itself?
What color is the cap or lid on top of the bottle?
What kind of label is affixed to the bottle?
Considering the label, what is the primary information conveyed?
What is the visible texture of the bottle's surface?
Are there any noticeable design elements on the label?

What is the apparent consistency of the contents within the bottle?
Is the bottle transparent enough to view the contents clearly?
Can you identify any brand or company markings?
Does the bottle have any visible imperfections or damage?
Considering the image, is the bottle standing upright?
